quote: Move.
Strong spirits! Make happy.
Buy me a drink?
Adventure! That's what I want and that's what I'm gonna get!
I may be small, but have you seen the size of my sword?
Hmph! You tall folk are all the same. Arrogant.
Blessings of the forest be upon you.
I do not associate with the ... lesser races.
By my beard, this is the poorest excuse for an ale I've ever seen!
Av ya seen the red mountains? They're a sight to make any dwarf weep!
I want some ale and I want it now!
You expect me to eat this?
Your cheapest room, innkeep!
Your best room... and don't keep me waiting.
Is it hot in here or is it me?
Food, ale, and a fire - what more could I want?
The air is better down here.
What I lack in beauty I make up for in brute strength.
Keep your friends close and your enemies dead, that's what I always say.
It smell's like a horse's backside in here!
Is that a dagger in your pocket or are you just happy to see me?
Want to hear a story?
A room with a view, if you don't mind.
This is my first stop in days!
This ale tastes like cat piss.
I had a sword like that once...
Where's the nearest blacksmith?
Are there guards here? I hope there aren't any guards here. Not that I'm hiding anything.
Ahhh...just like mom used to make it!
This is the ugliest inn I've ever seen!
A horse kicked me once...
Burn the witch!
Some people call this junk. Me, I call this treasure.
I used be an adventurer like you... then I took an arrow in the knee.
So you can cast a few spells? Big deal!
Need a blade?
Where can I find some new pants?
I heard the princess is getting married.
Who? Me? What's going on?
Has anyone seen my gold? I lost my gold!
Hey... wanna buy this potion?
By the beard of...! Oh never mind, I thought you were someone else.
This wine is terrible.
Humph. I should have just slept in the forest.
Salutations.
Does this cloak make me look fat?
You call this a menu?
A spot by the fire, wench!
Yegads, it's loud in here!
